title: Green Lantern Leading into Blackest Night (Updated)
description:
NOTE: If you downloaded my previous torrent from here, this torrent has been slightly updated. In the previous torrent, issue 031 contained a broken archive and was missing a page. I've also updated it to include the newest issue of Green Lantern at the time of this posting, issue 041.

If you downloaded the previous torrent, all you need to download is the corrected version of issue 031 and issue 041 of Green Lantern. Everything else is entirely the same!
---------------------------------------------------
Current Green Lantern universe leading into The Blackest Night. As of 18 May 2009, it is up to date on both Green Lantern and Green Lantern Corps.

Included:
Green Lantern: Rebirth
Green Lantern Corps: Recharge
Green Lantern (2005) issue 001-041 (including Final Crisis: Rage of the Red Lanterns)
Green Lantern Corps (2006) issues 001-036
Blackest Night #000
Tales of the Sinestro Corps

This includes the ENTIRE Sinestro Corps War in chronological order.

Also included are a few bonus stories.

I did not scan these issues. I just compiled these files, put them into chronological order, REMOVED ALL THE ADVERTISEMENTS, and put it up for everyone.
---------------------------------------------------
When Blackest Night gets into full swing in July, I will be uploading monthly updates to this torrent, which will include both main title series (Green Lantern and Green Lantern Corps), as well as the Blackest Night series and all related mini-series, one-shots, and crossovers. Check back!
